import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Redirect from '../common/Redirect'; class Remote extends Component { click = command => { const url = 'http://10.66.1.141:8060'; axios.post(url + command).then(res => { console.log('hello!!!'); }); }; render() { return (
this.click('/keypress/fwd')} class="col-4 pl-2 pr-0" >
this.click('/keypress/power')} className="pb-3" >
this.click('/launch/2595')} className="pb-3">
this.click('/launch/12')} className="pb-3">
this.click('/launch/837')} className="pb-3">
this.click('/launch/13535')} className="pb-3">
); } } export default Remote;
